buildCommand: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build --workspace=@casa-segura/web-pro && cp -r apps/web-pro/app . && cp -r apps/web-pro/.next . && cp -r apps/web-pro/public . 2>/dev/null || true && cp apps/web-pro/next.config.js . 2>/dev/null || true && cp apps/web-pro/tsconfig.json . 2>/dev/null || true
